sentences.english: A dummy is half truck in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一半埋入泥土中的卡车是掩体。

sentences.english: Hooker again, managed to make his way toward the bunker, where Johnson and Dingee were.
sentences.chinese: 胡克再次跑回了约翰逊和迪丹吉掩体。

sentences.english: It turned back toward the left his stay with the bunkers.
sentences.chinese: 就头也不回的离开了自己所呆着的的掩体。

sentences.english: Captured international assassins are locked up inside a high-tech bunker known as the Killing Chamber.
sentences.chinese: 占领国际刺客被锁在高科技掩体称为杀戮室。

sentences.english: Residents living on Yeonpyeong Island have been told to evacuate or take shelter.
sentences.chinese: 延平岛上的居民已被告知撤离该岛或躲入掩体避险。

sentences.english: Shielded tunnel of South Link Line, Ping-Tung.
sentences.chinese: 嘉和掩体隧道，屏东县南回线铁路。

sentences.english: The terrain was such that you couldn't sneak up to the machine gun emplacement without being seen.
sentences.chinese: 由于地形原因没法我们隐蔽前进到机枪掩体附近。

sentences.english: Taking shelter during a nuclear blast is absolutely necessary.
sentences.chinese: 在核爆炸的发生时，找掩体躲避是必要的选择。

sentences.english: Playing a short animation while looking for cover, and signaling the threat to team mates.
sentences.chinese: 在查找掩体的时候播放一个小动画，为队友打信号。

sentences.english: He steps out of his dugout, grabs his sniper rifle and smashes it to the tree.
sentences.chinese: 于是他拿着他的狙击枪爬出掩体，朝树上狠狠砸碎。

sentences.english: Man foxholes were hollowed out by the soldiers before fighting.
sentences.chinese: 战斗打响之前，士兵们挖出许多个人掩体。

sentences.english: The blast blew Dingee back into the front of the bunker.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸的气浪把迪丹吉推回到了掩体的前面。

sentences.english: The unused bunker was reopened in 2008 with its futuristic design.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 该地下掩体于2008年重新启用。

sentences.english: The troops were ordered to dig (themselves) in.
sentences.chinese: 部队奉命挖掩体构筑工事。

sentences.english: Heavy feet pounded on the platform of the blockhouse.
sentences.chinese: 沉重的脚步在掩体台上走动。

sentences.english: At once several gun crews aimed their guns at the fake flowerbed.
sentences.chinese: 几门大炮立刻瞄准了这个掩蔽的掩体。

definition: defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
pillbox (military fortification)/blockhouse/euphemistic way of writing 屌爆[diao3 bao4]
